header_title: Build modern interfaces with the Gravity design system and libraries
news_items_item1: Markdown-editor combines two modes: a visual editor and manual markup editing. It allows you to create and edit content in a convenient visual form while retaining full control over the underlying markup.
news_items_item2: We're thrilled to unveil Themer. Now you can easily customize our design system to your brand style and export your theme as a CSS file.
news_items_item3: 500‚≠êÔ∏è for our UIKit! We just wanted to say thanks for all the support and feedback we've been getting. There's more to come, so stay tuned!
news_items_item4: We've released the PinInput component. You may need it to enter OTP or confirmation codes.
features_feature1_description: Conceived as an in-house solution in response to real developers' needs, we released Gravity to the open-source community.
features_feature2_description: Experienced designers curate the look of our libraries, ensuring that components are stylish and consistent, with support for dark mode and high-contrast themes.
features_feature3_description: Regular feedback from our community of developers allows us to continuously improve our libraries, and break compatibility only when necessary.
roadmap_items_item1: Date Components: new library for working with date and time
roadmap_items_item7: UIKit: emoji picker, color picker, label input and range input components
